thread.title: Bed Bath’s Online Push: What’s in Store
thread.title_full: Bed Bath’s Online Push: What’s in Store - WSJ

author: Miriam Gottfried
title: Bed Bath’s Online Push: What’s in Store
text:
In the age of Amazon.com, retailers without an e-commerce presence risk being left behind. But those plunging into e-commerce without careful planning may find themselves worse off.
That is a danger Bed Bath & Beyond faces. The retailer has been beefing up its so-called omnichannel strategy, selling across the web, in stores and on mobile. It plans to invest heavily in projects such as analyzing purchasing data, a new... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
